oai_dc:dc.dc:title: College Grove School seventh grade class, 1951-52
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Names listed on back of photograph - source unknown.

Front row (L to R): Reda Mae Garland, Josephine Hilliard, Willodian Johnson, Ann Owen, Nancy Tomlin, Dorothy Ruth Pierce [Bowman], Jo Anne Paschall Upper row: Douglas Hargrove, Howard Pewitt, Eugene Ford [Tidwell], Norris Key, Bobby Coleman, and Mrs. John W. Covington (teacher). Several not present, including Jim Ogilvie and Robert Harper.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Rutherford County Schools Collection
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Portraits, Group; Students
